main.name: Abdullah Al-Suwaidi
main.description: I am looking to improve my skills to provide more value to companies
main.bio: Hi there! I am Abdullah! Currently looking to begin my first job. I've been coding for over 7 years now. As a Full Stack developer I'll be looking to work both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me if your looking to hire!

education.description: While I have gone to University I never finished a degree and instead decided to take on educating myself

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
